content: the baby bobble bear is a delightful no-sew amigurumi pattern that s perfect for crochet enthusiasts of all levels this adorable bear is crafted using plush dk weight chenille yarn and features textured bobble stitches for its arms legs tail and ears all crocheted directly onto the body for a seamless finish ideal for quick gifts keychains or adding a touch of whimsy to your crochet collection this pattern offers a satisfying and charming project * this pattern is written using us crochet terms * use the yarn under single_crochet 1 technique to achieve tighter more aligned stitches * learn how to seamlessly change color in crochet 2 mid-row or round to create clean color transitions * crochet in continuous spiral rounds do not join at the end of each round unless otherwise stated * use a running stitch marker 3 to keep your place when crocheting in rounds * use the ultimate finish 4 to neatly close up your amigurumi pieces * **optional** use invisible decrease 5 to enhance the appearance of your amigurumi * watch the youtube video tutorial 6 1 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2022/05/how-to-yarn-under-single-crochet html 2 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-change-color-in-crochet html 3 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-use-running-stitch-marker html 4 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/close-amigurumi-ultimate-finish html 5 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-single-crochet-decrease html 6 https //www youtube com/watch v=pjpkn_9hl9i
